openapi.title: Integrations.Github Repository Benefit.User Repositories
openapi.body: Lists available repositories for this user

openapi.title: List repositories
openapi.body: List repositories in organizations that the authenticated user is a admin of. Requires authentication.

openapi.title: Lookup repositories
openapi.body: Lookup repositories. Like search but returns at only one repository.

openapi.title: Get rewards summary
openapi.body: Get summary of rewards for resource.

openapi.title: Delete a personal access tokens
openapi.body: Delete a personal access tokens. Requires authentication.

openapi.title: List personal access tokens
openapi.body: List personal access tokens. Requires authentication.

openapi.title: Create a new personal access token
openapi.body: Create a new personal access token. Requires authentication.

openapi.title: Mark an issue as confirmed solved.
openapi.body: Mark an issue as confirmed solved, and configure issue reward splits. Enables payouts of pledges. Can only be done once per issue. Requires authentication.

openapi.title: Search pledges
openapi.body: Search pledges. Requires authentication. The user can only read pledges that they have made (personally or via an organization) or received (to organizations that they are a member of).

openapi.title: Get pledges summary
openapi.body: Get summary of pledges for resource.

openapi.title: Get user spending
openapi.body: Get current user spending in the current period. Used together with spending limits.

openapi.title: Create
openapi.body: Creates a pledge from a payment intent

openapi.title: Create Pay On Completion
openapi.body: Creates a pay_on_completion type of pledge

openapi.title: Create Invoice
openapi.body: Creates an invoice for pay_on_completion pledges

openapi.title: List organizations
openapi.body: List organizations that the authenticated user is a member of. Requires authentication.

openapi.title: List members in an organization
openapi.body: List members of an organization. Requires authentication.

openapi.title: Create Stripe Customer Portal
openapi.body: Start a new Stripe Customer session for a organization.

openapi.title: Stop delivery of articles via email.
openapi.body: Unsubscribe user from articles in emails.

openapi.title: Get number of potential receivers for an article.
openapi.body: Get number of potential receivers for an article.

openapi.title: Delete Benefit
openapi.body:
Delete a benefit.

> [!WARNING]
> Every grants associated with the benefit will be revoked.
> Users will lose access to the benefit.

openapi.title: List Benefit Grants
openapi.body:
List the individual grants for a benefit.

It's especially useful to check if a user has been granted a benefit.

openapi.title: Get Webhook Endpoint
openapi.body: Get a webhook endpoint by ID.

openapi.title: List Webhook Deliveries
openapi.body:
List webhook deliveries.

Deliveries are all the attempts to deliver a webhook event to an endpoint.

openapi.title: Redeliver Webhook Event
openapi.body: Schedule the re-delivery of a webhook event.

openapi.title: Update Product Benefits
openapi.body: Update benefits granted by a product.

openapi.title: Get Sales Statistics
openapi.body: Get monthly data about your sales and earnings.
